articles.title: No antibodies against Delta variant in 16% samples after two doses of Covishield: Study - India Today
articles.description: A new study claims that neutralising antibodies against the Delta variant of Covid-19 were not observed in 16 per cent of samples from those who had received both doses of the Covishield vaccine.
